abstract: Google is in talks to acquire Adscape Media in a move to expand beyond its traditional Internet search advertising business and into video games, according to The Wall street Journal. A deal for Adscape, a closely held San Francisco firm whose technology allows for the placement of ads over the Web in video games, could be reached as early as this week, the report said.
lead_paragraph: Google is in talks to acquire Adscape Media in a move to expand beyond its traditional Internet search advertising business and into video games, according to The Wall street Journal. A deal for Adscape, a closely held San Francisco firm whose technology allows for the placement of ads over the Web in video games, could be reached as early as this week, the report said.

headline.main: Google in Talks to Buy Internet Ad Firm, Report Says
